entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor (fail: Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.DevToolsProxy[0] sending error response for id) #45271
  • gRPC JSON transcoding — Unable to resolve descriptor for Enum (deserialize enum from string value) #45270
  • Caching: Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis doesn't provide createifnotexist method #45268
  • (BlazorServer) each navigation to external logs 2 errors a minute later #45267
  • Rare "The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception. Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.. An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host." #45266
  • Unable to set request body format to binary in minimal api #45265
  • `RouteHandlerBuilder.Accepts` does not return 415 response when the request has no `Content-Type` #45264
  • Quarantine SignalRClientWorksWithWebSockets #45262
  • Add SkipStatusCodePages flag to ApiBehaviorOptions #45260
  • Question : Should Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.HealthChecks extension respond success to HTTP PUT/POST/DELETE methods ? #45258
  • Debug blazor in vscode prompted "cannot launch browser: The URL's protocol must be one of "ws","wss:, or "ws+nuix;""" #45257
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Blazor HtmlRenderer: Use ReadOnlySpan instead of ArrayRange #45259
  • [Spa] Spa proxy enhancements #44638
    8.0-preview1
  • [Feature Request] Merging splatted attributes in Blazor #45230
    Backlog
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-38013: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #43953
    Discussions
  • Routing - cannot change precedence of DynamicRouteValueTransformer #45175
  • NET 6 Blazor WASM Hosted - Query diminishing performance #45100
  • Is there a way to increase the time to refresh the authentication state if RevalidatingIdentityAuthenticationStateProvider is being used? #45245
  • JavaScript to C# argument passing achieves a whopping 235 kb/s of throughput #44088
  • Results.Created returns a relative URI in the location header instead of an absolute (as in classic Web API) #45101
  • Grpc issue in native build of aspnetcore on ppc64le #44859
  • X-Requested-With header is incorrect in FetchHttpClient #44933
  • ASP.NET Core Module v2 17.0.22292.0 Very serious bug #45006

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding id to manifest.json files #45269
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261

Merged

  • Spa proxy enhancements #45232
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable `UsePkce` by default for Google and Facebook auth #45235
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Improved Bot Response for investigation issue #45254
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #45255
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2052665 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix for W3C cookie logging #45226
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45256
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
